## PublishQueuePrefix() function

Sets prefix for publish queue

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function PublishQueuePrefix(prefix: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prefix | string | Prefix that is used for each publish to queue |

ClassDecorator
